title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time
resume: Mexico: One Plate at a Time is a television series starring chef Rick Bayless and, on occasional episodes, his daughter Lanie Bayless. The show, currently broadcasting its eighth season, is distributed to public television stations by WTTW and also airs on PBS's Create channel, with reruns on ABC's Live Well Network digital subchannel.
